comment: Cesar Sayoc during his days as a "stripper." Sayoc was found homeless, living in a van in "Broward County" when arrested for the so-called "mail bombs." Broward County is the same location as the "Parkland School shooting." These false flags are getting more and more pathetic!
amr:
# ::snt Cesar Sayoc during his days as a "stripper." Sayoc was found homeless, living in a van in "Broward County" when arrested for the so-called "mail bombs." Broward County is the same location as the "Parkland School shooting." These false flags are getting more and more pathetic!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Cesar"
                  :op2 "Sayoc")
            :time (d / day
                  :time-of (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (s / stripe-01)
                        :domain p)))
      :snt2 (f / find-01
            :ARG1 (h / homeless
                  :domain p)
            :time (a / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (b / bomb-01
                        :instrument (e / email)
                        :mod (s2 / so-called))
                  :location (c / county
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Broward"
                              :op2 "County"))))
      :snt3 (s3 / same-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / county
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Florida"))
            :ARG2 (s4 / shoot-02
                  :location (s5 / school
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Parkland"
                              :op2 "School"))))
      :snt4 (g / get-03
            :ARG1 (f2 / flag
                  :mod (f3 / false)
                  :mod (t / this))
            :ARG2 (p3 / pathetic
                  :ARG1-of (ii / increase-01))))

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (p / productive-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :mod (h / hey
                        :mode expressive))
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (r / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t2 / they)))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :mod (o / other)))
                  :time (p3 / post-01
                        :ARG0 y)))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))
